net.tridentsdk.server.netty

Class ClientConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tridentsdk.server.netty.ClientConnection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlayerConnection

    public class ClientConnection
extends Object
    Handles the connection of a client upon joining
    Author:
    The TridentSDK Team

    • Method Detail

      • isLoggedIn

        public static boolean isLoggedIn(InetSocketAddress address)
        Checks if an IP address is logged into the server
        Parameters:
        address - the address to check if online
        Returns:
        true if the IP is on the server, false if not

      • getConnection

        public static ClientConnection getConnection(InetSocketAddress address)
        Gets the connection by the IP address
        Parameters:
        address - the IP to lookup the connection handler
        Returns:
        the instance of the client handler associated with the IP, or null if not registered

      • connection

        public static ClientConnection connection(ChannelHandlerContext chx)
        Gets the connection of a channel handler context
        Parameters:
        chx - the context of which to find the client from
        Returns:
        the client connection given the handler context, or null if not registered

      • registerConnection

        public static ClientConnection registerConnection(Channel channel)
        Registers the client channel with a protocol connection wrapper
        Parameters:
        channel - the channel of which the player is connected by
        Returns:
        the client connection that was registered

        Sends protocol data through the client stream
        Parameters:
        packet - the packet to send, encoded and written to the stream
